question: I want to read some advertisement So I will borrow​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Newspaper

Penjelasan:

it's because newspaper contain some advertisement in it

Jawaban:

I want to read some advertisement So I will borrow​ your newspaper / magazine.

Penjelasan:

Penulis ingin membaca beberapa iklan, jadi penulis akan meminjam koran / majalahmu untuk membacanya karena biasanya iklan (Advertisement) terdapat di koran / majalah.

Semoga membantu ya.
